data.text:
The reputation of the Sheraton and the house reef attracted us to the hotel, but we have been sorely disappointed.

I’m currently staying at the Sheraton Sharm with my family. We checked in over the Easter weekend when the hotel was quiet. In recent days, the number of residents has increased, but throughout, the service, especially in the restaurants has been appalling. Having to chase staff for cutlery, waiting 5-10 mins at the omelette station even to be seen, ordering drinks multiple teams, only to have finished three courses before they arrive.

I know Egypt isn’t know for its foods, The Sheraton has been one of the worst I’ve stayed at in Egypt in recent years.

The supposed snacks and food outside of the main restaurants are non-existent. Maybe the stale pastries in a box left over from breakfast available from the pool bar.

It’s not peak season, so I assume this is the reason for the slump and the hotel generally not being at its best, but I will not come back with the family.
data.title: Terrible Service and Awful Food

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests, 

Greetings from the Sheraton Sharm Hotel. 

According to your comments, It appears that we did not manage to meet your expectations for which I apologize on behalf of the entire team here at the Sheraton Sharm, & promise to give more care for the issues you raised. 

Dear guests, we apologize for the inconvenience during your stay at our hotel. Please be assured that we take your comments very seriously and have taken appropriate steps without delay to ensure you and all our guests have a pleasant and safe stay.

Natalia Plominska
Supervisor Guest Relations
owner_response.author: SSH-Management H

data.text:
The hotel is ok but if you’ve not booked, do look for an alternative hotel.
Good points first: rooms are huge and all have sea view; extremely clean everywhere; snorkelling ok.
Now sorry to say not so good points: hotel has nothing around it, you can only walk so far along front before getting turned back; only one pool
Opened; bar staff lazy; drinks absolutely awful(constant heartburn); food ok ish; Italian Al la carte nice… only 2 Al la carte opened; so called entertainment team really awful; beach is grit sand & you will see a picture of the so called foam party, which was held on the beach!!!
We went out and about few times but do not use the hotel taxi service, as they charge you quadruple to what Sharm taxis do!
Had a nice time as it was hot, but hotel not great but looks so nice which is such a shame
data.title: Ok ish

Dear Guest,    

On behalf of the entire hotel team, I want to thank you for sharing about Sheraton Sharm Hotel.

It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most – you! Your feedback has been shared with management as a way of celebrating the great guest experiences we delivered. Once again, I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.

We hope to welcome you again soon.

Sincerely,
Natalia Plominska
Supervisor - Guest Relations

data.text: It was amazing vacation in sharm el sheikh specially in Sheraton resort sharm el sheikh , thanks everyone working there everyday they try to give us different fun plus the hotel is clean , they stuffs they’re lovely and rooms food everything its amazing here.
data.title: Special thank for entertainment team Rema , Shika, Zoe  and Akon they’re best team I ever saw they try to do their best.

owner_response.author: SSH-Management H

data.text:
We had a very great stay in Sheraton. The hotel is really clean, with new structure and very well furnished, with much care for the details. The personnel is excellent. Starting from the bars and restaurant, both the chefs and the waiters are very careful of everyone’s needs and tastes. The food is great and changes every day, with international cuisine. The workers in reception are kind and available at any time. The cleaners of the rooms are cheerful and nice, not to mention their flawless way of setting the room every day. 
Lastly, the animation is another masterpiece of the resort. They work hard and organise involving activities every day, from morning to night. You will have the opportunity to practice different sports and practices, always with music and joyful vibe. Every night there are different activities and shows for the guests, which are entertained all day long. 
I would definitely recommend this hotel if you are looking for a relaxing yet fun and active holiday. 5 stars!!!
data.title: Perfect vacation
